simple_functions¶

Objective functions can be implemented in this file.

Author:
Yu-Ren Liu
class simple_function.SetCover[source]¶

set cover problem for discrete optimization this problem has some extra initialization tasks, thus we define this problem as a class

__init__()[source]¶
dim¶

Dimension of set cover problem. :return: Dimension instance

Objective function.

Parameters:solution – a Solution object
Returns:the value of f(x)
